content: There are a couple of responses that imply this article “is just opinion”, which I assume means they disagree with it. It may be opinion, but it’s also fact. My primary worry is for the kids — the healthcare problems, and the school problems are awful. The last Kansas budget news I heard, Brownback wanted to take money from the highway department and from the state pension funds to help close the budget gap. Everybody in Kansas seems to hate him, but they reelected him and his minions more than once. I don’t understand that. The Kansans on my border (Missouri) come here to buy groceries because the tax is lower. But they reelected him?
